name: KSLNewsradioTrafficReport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Depend on KSL Newsradio for up-to-the minute traffic information, provided every ten minutes during your commute and sooner when the conditions demand it. Our triple-team of traffic reporters has you covered from home to work or school and wherever else your travels take you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
